overview: An exquisitely shot insight into dance, dramaturgy and performance featuring dancer Michelle Heaven.  Limbs emerging from shimmering fabric, a torso draped in silk, gilded cloth and bodysuit. Find yourself enveloped by this cinematic peek into the multi-artform work The Prelude by Phillip Adamsâ€™ BalletLab and US choreographer Walter Dundervill.
title: The Prelude - Michelle
